adjectives.description: deportable (comparative more deportable, superlative most deportable)

entries.meaning: (rare, sometimes offensive) Someone who is deportable.
examples: 4. Deportables as a group show a death rate of 42. Our immigrants who have been in Canada over five years, show a rate of 36. The deportables have a higher rate, chiefly, no doubt, because they are on the average five years or more younger.The death rate of 21 in deportables from the British Isles is lower than our provincial rate of 28; the rate of those from Europe is to our rate as 47 is to 28;  […]
